title: Privacy Policy
description: Learn how Period Hub collects, uses, and protects your personal information and health data.

openGraph.description: Comprehensive privacy policy explaining how we handle your data with transparency and security.

intro: At Period Hub, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.
importantNoticeText: Period Hub is currently in MVP (Minimum Viable Product) stage. We collect minimal data and do not share your information with third parties. All health data is stored locally on your device.

mvpNotice.title: MVP Stage Notice
mvpNotice.text: As an MVP product, we prioritize your privacy by minimizing data collection and keeping all sensitive health information on your device.

importantNote.title: Local Storage Priority
importantNote.text: Most of your health data (pain tracking, cycle information) is stored locally on your device and never sent to our servers.

userProvided.title: Information You Provide
userProvided.description: Data you voluntarily share when using our services

symptomData.title: Symptom & Health Data
symptomData.description: Pain levels, cycle tracking, and symptom information (stored locally)

technicalInfo.title: Technical Information
technicalInfo.description: Browser type, device information, and usage analytics

mainPurposes.title: Main Purposes
items: Analyze usage patterns to enhance features

neverUsedFor.title: We Never Use Your Data For

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. Your health data remains private and is only accessible to you.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.disclaimer: While we implement industry-standard security measures, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: All data transmission uses HTTPS encryption

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.description: Strict access controls limit who can view your data

regularAudit.title: Regular Security Audits
regularAudit.description: We regularly review and update our security practices

management.title: Managing Cookies
management.text: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling cookies may affect site functionality.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.subtitle: You have control over your data

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or your data:

dataProtection.title: Data Protection Inquiries
dataProtection.subject: Subject: Privacy Policy Question
dataProtection.responseTime: We aim to respond within 48 hours

policyUpdates.title: Policy Updates
policyUpdates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes via email or prominent notice on our website.
policyUpdates.recommendation: We recommend reviewing this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

questionsDescription: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@periodhub.health
